sentences.sContent: Many players, coaches, executives, and referees have honed their skills in the CBA before going on to NBA careers.
sentences.sCn: 很多运动员、教练、执行官和裁判在转入NBA职业比赛之前，已在CBA经过了磨练。

sentences.sContent: I think it's quite good for professional sports especially the CBA clubs development since he has set a good example.
sentences.sCn: 我认为，自从他树立了一个好榜样之后，对职业运动，特别是CBA俱乐部的发展来说，是相当好的。

trans.tranCn: 中国篮球协会(China Basketball Association)，中国篮球协会（中国职业篮球联赛）
